stages.title: Define Your Economics & Business Vision
stages.description: Clarify your interests in economics, finance, management, or entrepreneurship, and identify target universities.

Global.overview: Top economics and business programs value strong analytical skills, quantitative ability, and clear career interests.
checklist: Research 5-7 top programs (Harvard, Wharton, LSE, Cambridge, NUS)
Identify your interest (economics, finance, management, entrepreneurship)
Assess your math and analytical preparation
Create a 3-year roadmap connecting academics, experiences, and applications

US.overview: US programs emphasize AP/IB rigor, leadership, and quantitative skills.
checklist: Complete AP Economics and AP Calculus
Research reach, target, and safety schools

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels, TSA/ECAA, and strong personal statements.
checklist: Review entry requirements for LSE, Cambridge, Oxford

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula with global standards.
checklist: Review economics and math in national exams

quiz.q: What do top economics programs value most?
opts: Strong math, analytical thinking, and quantitative skills
quiz.correct: Strong math, analytical thinking, and quantitative skills

stages.title: Build Business Skills & Experiences
stages.description: Develop leadership, analytical, and business skills through projects and experiences.

Global.overview: Demonstrate business acumen through real experiences, projects, or competitions.
checklist: Participate in business competitions (DECA, FBLA, or similar)
Start a small business, club, or initiative
Complete an economics research project or analysis
Document your leadership and business experiences
projectIdeas: Analyze a local economic issue and propose solutions
Start a small business or social enterprise
Create a financial model or business plan
Participate in a stock market simulation

US.overview: Link experiences to competitions and summer programs.
checklist: Join DECA, FBLA, or business clubs
Draft EPQ proposal on economics/business topic
Work with mentor on business project

quiz.q: What's the best way to demonstrate business skills?
opts: Real business experiences, competitions, and leadership
quiz.correct: Real business experiences, competitions, and leadership

stages.title: Strengthen Academic Foundation
stages.description: Excel in mathematics, economics, and analytical coursework.

Global.overview: Strong math and economics preparation is essential.
checklist: Study current economic events and trends
Maintain strong grades in math and social sciences
Take AP Calculus and AP Statistics

quiz.q: What academic areas are most critical for economics?

stages.title: Craft Your Business Narrative
stages.description: Translate your experiences and achievements into compelling applications.

Global.overview: Connect your business passion and achievements.

checklist: Prepare statements for UCAS and Common App

quiz.q: What should your economics/business statement highlight?
opts: Analytical passion, business experiences, and problem-solving
quiz.correct: Analytical passion, business experiences, and problem-solving

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish applications and prepare for interviews.

opts: Clear explanation of experiences and analytical thinking
quiz.correct: Clear explanation of experiences and analytical thinking
